main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Fresno, California on August 13, 1957. The object was described as a bright, dome-shaped, silent object that moved rapidly, hovered for a few seconds, and then moved away again very rapidly.
interesting points: The UFO was described as being about the size of a large cantaloupe with a blue center and a very bright edge.
It moved swiftly through the sky, stopped, hovered for a few seconds, then moved away again rapidly without making any sound.
The report concludes the sighting as 'Other (HALLUCINATION)', while a previous analysis of a similar sighting was labeled as 'Probably a Satellite'.
The witness describes the UFO as a round object, about the size of a basketball, with a 1/4 dome, glowing bright, and leaving a tail approximately 1 second long.
The UFO was observed to be traveling at about 1200 mph and disappeared behind trees.
